name: Origin Unknown (itch)
description: Welcome to Origin Unknown! Travel to ancient Greece and embark on a quest given to you by the mighty Gods of Olympus and save all of Greece and Olympus from the fearsome Giants. Travel throughout Greece and defeat mythical monsters like the Hydra and the Chimera in order to liberate cities like Athens. Travel to the Underworld and discover a secret that changes everything. Now do you dare enter a time of fantastic heroes and legendary monsters?
